由题意得
$$
f = (x -p)(x-q)(x-r)
$$

展开可知多项式长这样
$$
f = x^3 - (p+q+r)x^2 +(pq+pr+qr)x - pqr
$$

提取出系数解关于$p,q,r$的方程即可得到p,q,r，之后分别在模p,q,r下求解c的二次剩余，最后中国剩余定理组合即可

> exp.sage

```py
from Crypto.Util.number import *

coef3 = 1
coef2 = 15264966144147258587171776703005926730518438603688487721465
coef3 = 76513250180666948190254989703768338299723386154619468700730085586057638716434556720233473454400881002065319569292923
coef4 = 125440939526343949494022113552414275560444252378483072729156599143746741258532431664938677330319449789665352104352620658550544887807433866999963624320909981994018431526620619
c = 24884251313604275189259571459005374365204772270250725590014651519125317134307160341658199551661333326703566996431067426138627332156507267671028553934664652787411834581708944

# var('p,q,r')
# f1 = p+q+r == coef2
# f2 = p*q+p*r+q*r == coef3
# f3 = p*q*r == coef4
# res = solve([f1,f2,f3],[p,q,r])
# print(res)

p = 5487564316951417093934647798659941512646442958127439071827
q = 3868765709106144154703556118635822400623994075212553582411
r = 5908636118089697338533572785710162817248001570348495067227

R.<x> = PolynomialRing(Zmod(p))
f = x^2 - c
res1 = f.roots()

R.<x> = PolynomialRing(Zmod(q))
f = x^2 - c
res2 = f.roots()

R.<x> = PolynomialRing(Zmod(r))
f = x^2 - c
res3 = f.roots()

for i in res1:
    for j in res2:
        for k in res3:
            m = crt([int(i[0]),int(j[0]),int(k[0])],[p,q,r])
            print(long_to_bytes(m))
            # VNCTF{90dcfb2dfb21a21e0c8715cbf3643f4a47d3e2e4b3f7b7975954e6d9701d9648}
```
